name: MyRubik
description: A rubik's cube database for algorithms

scripts.imagemin: imagemin img/* --out-dir dist/img && imagemin img/oll/* --out-dir dist/img/oll && imagemin img/pll/* --out-dir dist/img/pll && imagemin img/patterns/* --out-dir dist/img/patterns
scripts.usemin: usemin oll.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/oll.html && usemin pll.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/pll.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin f2l.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/f2l.html && usemin patterns.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/patterns.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copyfonts && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
